# Koushik Jaladi

> Building machines that think

Personal blog of Koushik Jaladi - AI/ML engineer exploring machine learning, deep learning, and software engineering.

## Quick Links

- Homepage: http://localhost:4003
- Blog: http://localhost:4003/writing/
- Projects: http://localhost:4003/projects/
- About: http://localhost:4003/about/
- RSS Feed: http://localhost:4003/feed.xml
- Full Content: http://localhost:4003/llms-full.txt
